then.line: Not!
...Not? Not what?
Why get your vehicle OUT of a skid! Drifting is the coolest part of driving!
Right?
Right? It's pretty cool!
...Well, obviously it's cool.
It's also hugely wrong and incredibly dangerous.
That's also true.
Nevertheless, it is time to calculate your score...
Simple: exit the vehicle!
Exit the vehicle?!
Yeah! Roll out. Shoulder roll, probably.
You realize this is a test about safety, yes?
And that it's extremely dangerous to exit your vehicle at any time on the road?
But... I have a technicality.
Go on...
You said: "Road safety is everyone's safety. Everything on the road is a vehicle."
Which means I'm a vehicle. So when I roll out... the vehicle that is me...is out of the skid.
...While the...let's say "container vehicle" careens into a tree?
Win some, lose some. But I got this vehicle out of the skid!
Well... fair enough. I suppose it's time to tally the score.
Choose not to drive.
Choose not to drive?
Yeah. It's safest not to drive! Don't drive, avoid the problem.
Does that seem like the best course of action to you, Prota?
I mean, if preparedness is the best way not to lose my dog...
Well, Prota, perhaps you really do have a good grasp of road safety.
Yessss!
Let's see your score!
